review: Dr Havind Tandon ** ** ********* ****** *** ******* *** ****** ** ** ****** ***** ** *** *** hand with utmost care and his team of doctors are also outstanding. I got my second life after road accident due to Dr Tandon and his team at Apollo Hospital Delhi.

I went to this doctor taking an appointment , he recommended some tests .. I did all the tests but after that I had to give the appointment fees twice ... So won't recommend this doctor to any person *** ** **** ****** ***** **********
